plot: The crowded streets of New York City turn into fictive, filmic scenery. By playing with our collective memory-its cinematic codes and narrative language -- the piece questions the boundaries of reality and fiction.
title: Plot Point
plot_es: The crowded streets of New York City turn into fictive, filmic scenery. By playing with our collective memory-its cinematic codes and narrative language -- the piece questions the boundaries of reality and fiction.
